title: Rhyce Power's ex Vanessa Sierra reveals she once put cockroaches in the breakfast of ex
text:
Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra is known for her wild antics.

And on Wednesday night, the 25-year-old confessed she once put cockroaches in the breakfast of a 'lying' ex-boyfriend.

During a racy game called 'Excess Baggage', Vanessa admitted to hiding the insects in the meal for her partner to eat.

The taste of revenge! Rhyce Power's Love Island star ex Vanessa Sierra (ABOVE) admits to putting cockroaches in 'lying' boyfriend's breakfast

Co-star Adam Farrugia was the Islander who read out the candid disclosure.

'This girl once hid cockroaches in her boyfriend's breakfast when she caught him lying,' Adam read.

Adam then said the name Vanessa, with the revelation getting a round of applause from a mix of the girls and boys.

Ex: Vanessa was famously in a relationship with the Rhyce Power (pictured), brother of Married At First Sight star Jessika Power, with the two having an acrimonious split

'Don't take any breakfast from Vanessa,' Adam said, cheekily.

'I won't be eating any cereal in the kitchen anymore, put it that way,' another said.

Vanessa was famously in a relationship with the Rhyce Power, brother of Married At First Sight star Jessika Power.

Tumultuous romance: Reflecting on their split in March, Vanessa said, 'I ignored the red flags. Now, I'd say trust your gut if you've got a bad feeling'. Pictured with Rhyce earlier this year

Following her split with Rhyce, Vanessa briefly dated Married At First Sight star Daniel Webb.

However, this fling ended within a few weeks.

There is no suggestion Vanessa put cockroaches in the breakfast of Rhyce Power or Dan Webb.

Case of the ex: Vanessa also briefly dated Married At First Sight star Dan Webb (pictured)

Discussing her acrimonious split from Rhyce, Vanessa told TV Week: 'I ignored the red flags. Now I'd say trust your gut if you've got a bad feeling.'

Vanessa learned she was 'a lot stronger than [she] expected' after their public break-up, and is now ready to find a lasting relationship.

She alleged following her break-up with Rhyce that he assaulted her during a fitness holiday in Thailand in March. She later filed an intervention order in Australia.

Her truth: Love Island Australia's Vanessa Sierra has reflected on her former relationship with Rhyce Power, saying she didn't realise something was wrong until it was too late

Under the Victorian intervention order, which is similar to an apprehended violence order (AVO), the heavily-tattooed tradesman is banned from contacting Vanessa.

In a lengthy statement shared to Instagram in April upon his return to Sydney, Rhyce said there was more to the story and appeared to deny Vanessa's claims.

'There's always two sides to every story, and everyone needs to believe that,' he said.

Love Island Australia continues on Channel Nine, Wednesday, 8.45pm.
description: Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra is known for her wild antics.  And on Wednesday night, the 25-year-old confessed she once put cockroaches in the breakfast of a 'lying' ex-boyfriend.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
